Title: Beasts of the Southern Wild
Writer: Lucy Alibar (screenplay), Benh Zeitlin (screenplay), Lucy Alibar (stage play "Juicy and Delicious")
Actors: Quvenzhan√© Wallis, Dwight Henry, Levy Easterly, Lowell Landes
Plot: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 91 wins & 129 nominations.
